title: Aquatic Charge Attack
description: Enables an aquatic mob to dash at its target with knockback; includes overshoot and cooldown settings.

attack_reach.title: Attack Reach
attack_reach.description: Horizontal reach grown around the mob's AABB to register a hit.

charge_cooldown_time.title: Charge Cooldown Time
charge_cooldown_time.description: Range of time in seconds to wait before starting another charge.

charge_overshoot_distance.title: Charge Overshoot Distance
charge_overshoot_distance.description: Distance beyond the target the mob aims during a charge.

charge_speed_multiplier.title: Charge Speed Multiplier
charge_speed_multiplier.description: Speed multiplier applied during the charge.

knockback_force.title: Knockback Force
knockback_force.description: Knockback force applied to the target on hit.

max_charge_distance.title: Max Charge Distance
max_charge_distance.description: Maximum distance at which the mob attempts a charge.
